meanings.definition: believers in the doctrine of the Trinity, which holds that God is three persons in one essence.
meanings.sent1: The tritheists gathered at the church to worship together.
meanings.sent2: Many tritheists celebrate the concept of the Trinity in their prayers.
meanings.sent3: The tritheists joked that God must have a busy schedule managing three persons at once.
meanings.sent4: The idea of tritheists believing in a triune God is like a three-part harmony in music.
meanings.sent5: The image of tritheists praying to a God with three distinct personalities is fascinating.

meanings.definition: those who adhere to the belief in three separate gods.
meanings.sent1: In ancient mythology, tritheists worshipped three distinct deities.
meanings.sent2: Some tritheists follow traditions that involve rituals for each of the three gods.
meanings.sent3: The tritheists playfully argued about which of the three gods had the most power.
meanings.sent4: The tritheists' belief in three separate gods is like having three different leaders in a council.
meanings.sent5: The tritheists' devotion to three gods sets them apart from monotheistic believers.
